This is a plain text document for testing text extraction.

It contains multiple lines and paragraphs to verify that the extraction
preserves the formatting and content correctly.

Key features to test:
- Multiple paragraphs
- Special characters: áéíóú, ñ, €, @, #, $, %, &
- Numbers: 1234567890
- Punctuation: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?

This document should be extracted completely by the Extractous library.
